dmca.title: [TP-C281003U] Copyrighted material hosting on your server - RF Online
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Thursday, July 27, 2006 5:15 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C281003U] Copyrighted material hosting on your server - RF Online Subject: [TP-C281003U] Copyrighted material hosting on your server - RF Online From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C281003U] Copyrighted material hosting on your server - RF Online Reference: [TP-C281003U] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Copyrighted material hosting on your server - RF Online Added by system at Thursday, Jul 27 2006 08:57 am X-MailFrom: MichaelR@codemasters.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Thu Jul 27 08:53:12 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 27 Jul 2006 08:53:11 -0500 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.110]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from MichaelR@codemasters.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1G66IZ-000LCw-CA for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Thu, 27 Jul 2006 08:53:11 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 27 Jul 2006 08:53:10 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from MichaelR@codemasters.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1G66IY-0003Xb-K3 for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 27 Jul 2006 08:53:10 -0500 Received: from mail2.codemasters.com ([195.70.93.44] helo=chekov.codemasters.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from MichaelR@codemasters.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1G66IX-0000dQ-K8 for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 27 Jul 2006 08:53:09 -0500 Received: from ROD.codemasters.local (unverified) by chekov.codemasters.com (Clearswift SMTPRS 5.2.3) with ESMTP id for ; Thu, 27 Jul 2006 14:54:26 +0100 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5.7226.0 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6B184.2C1C3E67" Subject: Copyrighted material hosting on your server - RF Online Date: Thu, 27 Jul 2006 14:54:26 +0100 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Copyrighted material hosting on your server - RF Online Thread-Index: AcaxhCwlniopynyvQROlb/tOeIxw2A== From: "Michael Rowland" To: Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 195.70.93.44 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of codemasters.com) client-ip=195.70.93.44; envelope-from=MichaelR@codemasters.com; helo=chekov.codemasters.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 27 Jul 2006 13:53:10.0832 (UTC) FILETIME=[FF471B00:01C6B183] Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 70.87.6.110 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of codemasters.com) client-ip=70.87.6.110; envelope-from=MichaelR@codemasters.com; helo=smtp01.theplanet.com; (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To the server hosts of the RF Online RF Extreme private game server, I have traced the source of an illegal game server to your company and would like to inform you of a breach in the Digital Millennium Act as described below. Please take swift action in removing and deleting the copyrighted files from your hosting servers. DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT 1. Detailed identity of the copyrighted work that I believe has been infringed upon. This includes identification of the web page or specific posts, as opposed to entire sites. Posts must be referenced by either the dates in which they appear or the permalink of the post >URL of Illegal Private game server is 70.87.69.74 2. Identity of the material that I claim is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above. >RF Online game server which is licensed to Codemasters Online Gaming, Lower Farm, Southam, Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, CV47 2DL, UK 3. Location of the author copyright notice (for information). >The game is licensed for the US by Codemasters. URL of the game site is http://www.rf-onlinegame.com/ 4. Information to permit our company, the provider, to contact you. >You can contact myself at michaelr@codemasters.com. I am Michael Rowland, Associate Producer for RF Online 5. Statements I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web pages/hosting sites is not authorized by my registered copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is infringed. Your signature >Michael Rowland >Associate Producer >RF Online >Codemasters Online Gaming Michael "Zzeno" Rowland Associate Producer Codemasters Online Gaming +44 (0) 1926 814132 ************************************************************************ ********** This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager. This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses. ************************************************************************ ********** MIME element (text/html) Copyrighted material hosting on your server - RF Online

To the server hosts of the RF Online RF Extreme private game server,
I have traced the source of an illegal game server to your company and would like to inform you of a breach in the Digital Millennium Act as described below.

Please take swift action in removing and deleting the copyrighted files from your hosting servers.
DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT
1. Detailed identity of the copyrighted work that I believe has been infringed upon. This includes identification of the web page or specific posts, as opposed to entire sites. Posts must be referenced by either the dates in which they appear or the permalink of the post

>URL of Illegal Private game server is 70.87.69.74
2. Identity of the material that I claim is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.
>RF Online game server which is licensed to Codemasters Online Gaming, Lower Farm, Southam, Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, CV47 2DL, UK

3. Location of the author copyright notice (for information).
>The game is licensed for the US by Codemasters. URL of the game site is http://www.rf-onlinegame.com/
4. Information to permit our company, the provider, to contact you.
>You can contact myself at michaelr@codemasters.com. I am Michael Rowland, Associate Producer for RF Online
5. Statements
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web pages/hosting sites is not authorized by my registered copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is infringed.

Your signature
>Michael Rowland
>Associate Producer
>RF Online
>Codemasters Online Gaming


    Michael "Zzeno" Rowland
     Associate Producer
    Codemasters Online Gaming
    
+44 (0) 1926 814132
 <http://www.rf-onlinegame.com/&g t;

*********************************************** ***********************************

This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and

intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they

are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify

the system manager.

 

This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by

MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses.

*********************************************** ***********************************

MIME element (text/plain)
